response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This represents a substantial discount compared to the market value of $10,000, making it an excellent opportunity for you to maximize efficiency and profitability. I trust this offer aligns well with your financial considerations and strategic goals. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 9500}
